articles.title: Ariane 6 ready to rocket, bringing heavy-lift capability back to Europe - The Register
articles.description: Just a wet dress rehearsal left before debut launch
articles.content:
The much-delayed Ariane 6 rocket is scheduled to launch on July 9 from Europe's Spaceport in French Guiana.
